text.__SUMMARY__: Krapfia weberbaueri is a plant in the family Ranunculaceae. It is endemic to Peru.
text.Description:
Krapfia weberbaueri is a perennial herb with basal leaves ranging from 10–30 cm (3.9–11.8 in) in length that grow in clumps of 3-5. Its flowers grow up to 5 cm (2.0 in) in diameter.
